thread.title: Hershey's supersizes one of its most popular treats
thread.title_full: Hershey's supersizes one of its most popular treats

title: Hershey's supersizes one of its most popular treats
text:
Published By: CBS News: Moneywatch - Today 
The tweak will double the size of this famous candy, feature a hazelnut center, and go on sale early next month...
